day name: Blessed Vincent Levoniuk and His Twelve Companions: Nykyta Hrytsiuk, Ivan Andreychuk, Constantine Boyko, Michael Vavryshchuk, Onuphriy Vasyliuk, Philip Kyryliuk, Maxim Havryliuk, Daniel Karmashchuk, Constantine Lukashchuk, Bartholomew Osypiuk, Luke Boyko and Ignatius Franchuk, Martyred at Pratulyn in 1874; Saint hieromartyr Clement, Bishop of Ancyra, Saint Martyr Agathangel, Blessed Venerable Martyr Olimpia Bida, Superior of the Sisters of St. Joseph
name: of Pratulyn
hieromartyr Clement, Bishop of Ancyra
Martyr Agathangel
Venerable Woman-Martyr Olimpia Bida, Superior of the Sisters of St. Joseph
troparia: (Tone 7) Having revealed to all the world the power of your spirit,* O our thirteen glorious martyrs,* you irrigated our land with your blood,* accepting these sufferings voluntarily,* receiving heavenly crowns for this,* and so, pray to Christ the King ** to give us His great mercy.
kontakia: (Tone 3) You considered your earthly life as nothing,* you despised the glory of this world,* you became apostles of the catholic faith,* now you stand before the King of glory,* and so, pray to him to preserve our Ukraine,* the people who tirelessly glorify you.
